Summary: I saw a big spher coming down in between the trees
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Toluca de Lerdo
There were no other sightings in Toluca de Lerdo on or around December 15th 2000
divs: sighting detailsi saw a big spher when i was 12 years old i saw it coming down in between the trees the color was a bright redish-orange and it last it about 3 to 5 min i don't remember the exact time but it was around 8-9 pm in my dads ranch in mexico and small town called toluca, i've been telling everybody since then but tonight i saw one of the episodes of aliens over the earth and you guys made a digital copy if what the guy was telling you guys that he saw three sphere coming down thru\down the trees but when i saw that it was the same thing that i had seen years ago and know i can say that someone has seen the same thing i had experience and that i wasn't just going crazy thanks for the opportunity to make this digital image of what i have seen...
